name: max-repel
effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Repels weak wild
POKéMON for 250
steps.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Repels weak wild
POKéMON for 250
steps.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 250 steps.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.

An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.

An item that prevents weak wild

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
An item that prevents any low-level
wild Pokémon from jumping out at
you for 250 steps after its use.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer
than Super Repel.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer
than Super Repel.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
An item that drives away wild Pokémon so you won’t
encounter them. It lasts longer than a Super Repel.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon
from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer
than Super Repel.
